title: Process Hidden Fees
description: With your aid, you can process additional taxes, fees, and payments. Attempt a basic Trade check to determine what sorts of additional resources you gather.

success.msg: @gain1ResourceDiceNextTurn, but the citizens suspect something is going on: if you attempt to Process Hidden Fees on the next Kingdom turn, the result is worsened one degree.

modifiers.name: Processed Hidden Fees on the Previous turn
modifiers.buttonLabel: Worsen Degree of Success when processing hidden fees next turn

failure.msg: @gain1ResourceDiceNextTurn, but the citizens catch wind of the fees and grow unhappy. @gain1Unrest, and you cannot Process Hidden Fees on your next Kingdom turn.

criticalFailure.msg: @gain1ResourceDiceNextTurn, but the citizens catch wind of the fees and grow unhappy. @gain1d6Unrest, and you cannot Process Hidden Fees on your next Kingdom turn.
